data.text: @AAPNews @aap_peds And the authors of the study are all in the pockets of big pharma. How can the public trust the AAP when you consistently have conflicts of interest? https://t.co/Vly3Eq7Txz
@AAPNews @aap_peds @fordnation and CMOH have you reviewed this study before announcing the end of mask mandates in schools?
